attributes.action: Petition for the removal of Boris Johnson as Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe spent 6 years in prison thanks to Johnson’s inaccurate commons statement. The abandonment of our allies in Afghanistan to face almost certain death is a constant source of shame. Whilst “Partgate” was in full swing, families we’re prevented form comforting their loved ones. The list goes on. 
The prospect of this country going to war with such a commander-in-chief doesn’t bare thinking about. We need a leader with honesty, humility and integrity; we need a statesman, not a clown.
attributes.background: After three years of exceptionally poor leadership, enough is enough. The decision on whether Mr Johnson remains our Prime Minister should be determined by the people of the United Kingdom in a General Election if that’s what it takes. David Davis said it best; ‘in the name of God, go!’

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

You might like to sign the following petitions, which call for related actions:

Require MPs who break the law be removed from office
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614705

An MP found guilty of breaking any law is automatically subject to recall
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614888
